ImyaExpose.Description: The storage capacity each freight train adds to nearby warehouses
The range within freight trains incluence warehouses

English.Text:
Ornamental Trains (Lion053)

Changelog v1.4

- Add a steampunk skin for all trains. Use the skin painter tool from your tool bar or select any ornamental train and choose the skin in the UI.

- Reduced vertex count of barely visible mesh parts

- Add Chinese translation, thanks to hanthe2th!
